title:
The second moment of Maass form symmetric square L-functions at the
  central point
abstract:
Recently R.Khan and M.Young proved a mean Lindel\"{o}f estimate on the second
moment of central values of Maass form symmetric-square $L$-function on the
interval $T<|t_j|<T+T^{1/5+\epsilon}$, where $t_j$ is a spectral parameter of
the Maass form. We provide another proof of this result.
